Question: By August 1935, this person found himself with a band that was nearly broke, disillusioned and ready to quit.
Hints: His father was David **** (1873-1926), a tailor from Warsaw; his mother was Dora Grisinsky (1873-1964) from Kaunas, Lithuania.
This person's success story was told in the 1955 motion picture The ____ Story with Steve Allen and Donna Reed.
When **** finished his solo, he unexpectedly gave a solo to pianist Jess Stacy.
